io.micronaut.jackson.codec

Class JsonMediaTypeCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.jackson.codec.JsonMediaTypeCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MediaTypeCodec
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JsonStreamMediaTypeCodec

    @Singleton
public class JsonMediaTypeCodec
extends Object
implements MediaTypeCodec
    A MediaTypeCodec for JSON and Jackson.

    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
